channel.title: Activision Confirms Infinity Ward's Next Game Will Be Call Of Duty
channel.description:
http://g4tv.com/thefeed/blog/post/704524/Activision-Confirms-Infinity-Wards-Next-Game-Will-Be-Call-Of-Duty-.html
I guess the people that are still left at Infinity Ward will be making this?
Oh and second half of 2010 there will be more DLC for MW2 http://g4tv.com/thefeed/blog/post/704523/Next-Modern-Warfare-2-Downloadable-Content-Coming-Later-This-Year.html

item.title: Activision Confirms Infinity Ward's Next Game Will Be Call Of Duty
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I’m just going to post what I said on GB about this issue as well.

[QUOTE=Dawgw00t;30070040]I believe that Treyarch will make Black Ops way better than MW2. Now like many other people I loved COD4, but IW has ignored the community in MW2. I believe Treyarch will learn from IW’S mistakes and make the new Call of Duty better both in gameplay and community input.

WaW could never beat COD4. Now is Treyarch’s chance to prove their company as a powerful game developer.[/QUOTE]

Read full topic
item.source: Activision Confirms Infinity Ward's Next Game Will Be Call Of Duty

item.title: Activision Confirms Infinity Ward's Next Game Will Be Call Of Duty
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Agreed casey, if they fail to fix anything in black ops then my money is going towards battlefield from now on.

Read full topic
item.source: Activision Confirms Infinity Ward's Next Game Will Be Call Of Duty

item.title: Activision Confirms Infinity Ward's Next Game Will Be Call Of Duty
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Why don’t they fix the game rather then release maps.

I honestly find the game unplayable with spawn tubes, over-distanced shotguns, and migration.

Read full topic
item.source: Activision Confirms Infinity Ward's Next Game Will Be Call Of Duty

item.title: Activision Confirms Infinity Ward's Next Game Will Be Call Of Duty
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:11, topic:339271”][quote author=Niall link=topic=435656.msg3211395#msg3211395 date=1274286572]

[quote author=the bank link=topic=435656.msg3208408#msg3208408 date=1274016576]

Oh and second half of 2010 there will be more DLC for MW2
http://g4tv.com/thefeed/blog/post/704523/Next-Modern-Warfare-2-Downloadable-Content-Coming-Later-This-Year.html

Only because the boycott of not buying it didn’t work, so they ended up making more millions with the first map pack. Now it’s just becoming a hobby to fork that $15 price tag out of everyone’s pocket.
[/quote]and the fact IW maps are 9001x better than Treyarch’s

Say what? COD5 had better maps than COD4.
[/quote]Not a chance in hell.[/quote]

uranidiot.

Read full topic

item.title: Activision Confirms Infinity Ward's Next Game Will Be Call Of Duty
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:6, topic:339271”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=435656.msg3205976#msg3205976 date=1273809428]

Oh and second half of 2010 there will be more DLC for MW2
http://g4tv.com/thefeed/blog/post/704523/Next-Modern-Warfare-2-Downloadable-Content-Coming-Later-This-Year.html

Only because the boycott of not buying it didn’t work, so they ended up making more millions with the first map pack. Now it’s just becoming a hobby to fork that $15 price tag out of everyone’s pocket.
[/quote]It’s not bad considering what you get, and the fact IW maps are 9001x better than Treyarch’s[/quote]
Treyarch’s community listening abilities and IW’s graphics along with a new gameplay overhaul will fix the games.

Read full topic

item.title: Activision Confirms Infinity Ward's Next Game Will Be Call Of Duty
item.dc:creator: @Unlimited1 .Unlimited
item.description:
@Unlimited1 wrote:

The “Resurgence” map pack comes to xbox on June 3rd with three are all-new maps (Carnival, Fuel and Trailer Park) while the remaining two (Vacant and Strike) are returning from Call of Duty 4

And all for $15 again!

http://www.shacknews.com/onearticle.x/63806
http://www.shacknews.com/onearticle.x/63799

Read full topic

item.description:
@Erj wrote:

Main reasons I didn’t buy COD:MW2
-Glitch/Bug Abusers
-No Dedi’s
-IW is pretty much dying.

Can’t wait for EA’s “Respawn” studio’s games.
